headline: Jim Cramer Recommends NVIDIA Corporation Over Skyworks Solutions (SWKS)
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Talked About These 16 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Skyworks Solutions, Inc. headline: Jim Cramer Recommends Nvidia Over 'Very Cheap' Semiconductor Stock
summary: On CNBC's “Mad Money Lightning Round,” Jim Cramer said Cerence Inc. (NASDAQ:CRNC) is a “winner.” Supporting his view, Cerence, on May 7, posted better-than-expected quarterly earnings. Aurora Cannabis Inc. (NASDAQ:ACB) is a “nice speculative” stock, ...
